meanings.definition: A book with a series of pictures that vary gradually from one page to the next, so that when the pages are turned rapidly, the pictures appear to animate.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed watching the flipbooks come to life as I flipped through the pages.
meanings.sent2: Kids love creating flipbooks to see their drawings move like a mini movie.
meanings.sent3: The flipbooks at the store made me giggle with their funny animations.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination was like a flipbook, each idea seamlessly flowing into the next.
meanings.sent5: The flipbooks in the museum were so captivating, I couldn't look away.

meanings.definition: To create a flipbook by drawing a series of pictures that vary gradually from one page to the next.
meanings.sent1: She decided to flipbooks her story to make it more engaging.
meanings.sent2: We spent the afternoon flipbooking our own little animations.
meanings.sent3: The artist flipbooksed a hilarious scene that had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: His creativity flipbooksed seamlessly, each drawing leading to the next.
meanings.sent5: I flipbooksed my memories, each page a snapshot of my past.
